"Alright, let's get started.": "So, this time I'll be talking about Dualomite and Photon Chunks."
"Dualomite is a purple Ore with a jagged formation. It's an Ore similar in colour to Photon Chunks, but with different properties."
"They're both gorgeous gems, but they can also be used at the Item Lab as catalysts for strengthening your equipment."
"Many can be found dotting the walls of the Southern Aerio caverns. It'd do you good to go and try finding some."
